author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-15. Provide confirmation of local file load.
- "Load File" button now toggles between text and spinning-loading-wheel
state to signify loading to the user.
- Changes the request layout in ObservationSelectCtrl.uploadLocalFile to
use promises. This reduces the total amount of code and allows us to
toggle the loading state easier.
- Adds a disabled function for the "Load File" button which prevents the
user from submitting a file multiple time in a row.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-21. Fixes UI frontend to backend communication.
- Adds /getPathLeader/ endpoint to directory_helpers.py that provides
access to the path that is prepended to all directory listing queries.
- Adds local to ObsercationSelectCtrl for holding the pathLeader
retrieved from the above endpoint.
- Updates local model upload and adding code to include proper path
formating with new leader information.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-14. Prevent users from listing arbitrary directories.
- Adds a prefix to all queried paths to forces the user to remain in a
desired directory.
- Strips out "/../" from the passed path to prevent moving to an
undesired directory.

author: daijy
msg: PIG-3069: Native Windows Compatibility for Pig E2E Tests and Harness

author: tn
msg: [COLLECTIONS-461] Added javadoc clarification to Put. Thanks to mbenson.
